articles.title: Arizona has highest rate of new coronavirus infections, CDC says - Fox News
articles.description: Arizona is seeing the highest rate of new coronavirus cases in the U.S., according to data compiled by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, (CDC) which shows an average of 121.8 new illnesses per 100,000 people over the last seven days.

articles.title: Bleak start to new year for Britain as it enters third lockdown - Reuters
